attachments.title: Mysterious Mac Malware Infected at Least 30,000 Devices Worldwide | SecurityWeek.Com
attachments.text: Researchers uncover a new Mac malware that has infected at least 30,000 devices and which appears to be the first malware to abuse the macOS Installer JavaScript API.
attachments.fallback: Mysterious Mac Malware Infected at Least 30,000 Devices Worldwide | SecurityWeek.Com
